content: SPA files may also incorporate transparency (e.g., .PNG or .TGA files), but they are most commonly created from non-transparent bitmap images.
NOTE: You can create a SPA file by drawing a Bitmap image (".bmp" file) with any graphics editor and renaming the extension to ".spa."

description: 3D model effects file used by MikuMikuDance, a dance and rhythm synchronization game; saved as a .BMP image but uses the ".spa" extension instead; used for adding a shiny look to 3D model features such as hair or clothes.
